title: Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream Entering a new house in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream of a new home for a married woman, for a single woman, for a girl, a pregnant woman, buying a new spacious house, a vision of moving to the old house. The meaning of the new house. The house in a dream for the one who sees it represents the nature of his worldly life, that is, as the person who sees in the dream a complete new house. If the The new house in the dream is big, it means that the dreamer’s world is big and he will learn from it and be generous as well. If the house is cramped, this indicates that he is stingy and a new house also means renewal of work. A house built of iron in a dream indicates the long life of its owner, and a house of clay. If the dreamer builds a house in an unknown place and is single, he will get married. After all, it is rumored that whoever builds a house in a dream, one of his relatives or children will die, and whoever sells his house will divorce his wife. The interpretation of a house in a dream has many meanings, including comfort, privacy, and security. The appearance of a house in a dream reflects different feelings and different emotional and psychological states. The roof of the house is on Example shows thought and logic, while the basement indicates the subconscious. If the house is empty, this indicates a lack of feeling of security. If in a dream you see changes in the house, this indicates a change in your personality and thoughts. If you see yourself cleaning the house, this It indicates that you will be convinced of new ideas. If in reality you live in a full house and dream that the house is empty, this indicates that in reality you desire liberation and aspire to live independently. Old houses denote old beliefs and ideas. If you see a new house in your dream, this It symbolizes the end of an era in your life and the beginning of a new era. A new home symbolizes the beginning of a new phase, whether it be on an emotional, financial, professional or social level. Expect the factors that the next few days will bring that will change your life in an unexpected way. If you dream that someone Breaking into your house, it means that your house will be broken into. After all, if the dreamer builds a new house and destroys it, the subject indicates his death, and if he builds a new house or buys it, goodness will come to him. Entering new houses and residences is good omens, they are a symbol of entering the world Through a new door, any new experience can be related to marriage in our area or sometimes at work. Seeing this dream promises success and profit. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying a new house or house, he is accepting a new world full of goodness and joy, and this indicates a prestigious job or position. Buying a new house in a dream is a sign of entering a new stage of life and can indicate years And years of earning, giving, offering, and material or moral achievements. As for buying a new house in a student’s dream, it symbolizes success and excellence in study, and it is also a symbol of success in exams, especially for those who wish to enroll in universities. Interpretation of a new house in an unmarried girl’s dream: A new house indicates A person's dream of a new life and a stage full of joy

title: Interpretation of seeing a policeman in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we take a look at the interpretation of seeing a policeman in a dream of a single girl, a man, a married and pregnant woman, a single young man, and a divorced woman. Interpretation of seeing a policeman in a dream for a single girl: Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream of a policeman is an unfavorable vision, because it indicates that she will be exposed to evil, worries, and difficult crises, and by God I know. The vision also shows that she is under psychological pressure, because she feels lonely and does not find someone she loves to complain to about her anxiety, and God knows best. Some scholars interpreted for the policeman the vision of an unmarried girl in her sleep. She has a strong personality and regains her rights from her oppression by the law. Seeing an unmarried girl in The dream means that she will achieve all her dreams. And that God will give her a lot of money, food, and blessings, God willing. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a policeman is arresting her, this is evidence that she has committed a crime against the law and society, and God knows best. As for seeing that the policeman has arrested her Then release her again. She will be exposed to a major problem that will cause her sadness, and she will find solutions to it, God willing. This problem could be financial or physical, and God knows best. Seeing a girl in a dream running away from the police is evidence that there are enemies around her who are conspiring against her, and God knows best. Seeing a single girl In a dream, the police are searching for her to arrest her, which is evidence that she is in trouble, causing her distress and sadness, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a policeman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a policeman in a dream for a married woman. For a married woman to see the police in her dream means that she will regain something that she had previously lost in her life. Scientists have also interpreted this vision in a married woman’s dream as meaning that she will give birth to children with good morals, God willing. The police in a married woman’s dream is a mystery and complicated things or a secret that she hides from people and does not want to reveal to anyone. For a married woman to see in her dream that the police are interrogating her is good news. For her success in her field of work, God willing. If a married woman sees that the police are arresting one of her sons, this is evidence that this son will become a very important son to her. A married woman escaping from the police in a dream is evidence of her fear of the future. If he is arrested, he will repent of sin. That he committed. Seeing the police and drugs in a dream for a married woman is evidence of making a living and a lot of money that she will get for a whole year. Provided that the married woman is good. It is an undesirable vision to see a married woman driving a police car. Because it indicates that he will pass During a period of distress, distress, and difficult times, and God is Most High and Knowing. If a married woman sees a police car and is afraid of it, this is evidence that she has been anxious or afraid for a while, and God knows best. Some scholars also interpreted the police in a married woman’s dream as her husband’s love for her. And if the police entered Her house is evidence of marital discord. If the police leave her house, this is evidence that the problems will end, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a policeman in a dream about a man and its meaning. A policeman in a man’s dream is evidence of his success in his or her work, and evidence of abundant sustenance, and abundant livelihood for him, with permission.

title: Interpretation of walking in a dream at night, interpretation of dark dreams

preview.html: In this article, you can learn about the interpretation of walking in a dream and its meaning in detail for you. Walking is a sport that we practice every day and go to different places a short distance from home and some are willing to practice it early. In the morning for activity and vitality. On the other hand, this dream is one of the common dreams whose interpretations vary depending on the situation. Some of us dream of walking a long road, known or unknown, dark or narrow. Interpretation scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, have worked hard to analyze the meaning of this dream, which you will find in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of walking in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin says in explaining the meaning of this dream: It indicates the conditions of the dreamer in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is walking barefoot in The street, the interpretation of this dream is good and stops worries and problems. In the case of walking backwards in the street, this vision reflects the extent of the dreamer’s nostalgia for the past. Seeing yourself walking in a narrow place indicates a state of tension and anxiety in the dreamer about something in reality. If If the dreamer dreams that he is walking on a familiar path to him, then this dream is an indication of the goal that he is pursuing in reality. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that if the dreamer sees that he is walking on the street and finds a white dog in front of him, then this vision deserves praise for him and announces his marriage in the near future. If the dreamer sees that he is walking alone in the street, then this vision is a reflection of his personality, which is characterized by his indifference to the opinions of others about him. Seeing him crossing the road in a dream means that the dreamer will undergo changes in his life. If a man sees that he is walking in the opposite direction, this vision indicates He is in a competition in reality. But if he sees that he is walking a long road and suddenly stops walking for some reason, then this vision means that someone is trying to harm him in reality. Seeing himself walking down a dead end path indicates that he is actually walking on the wrong path and this vision It is a warning message to him that he must be careful of this path. Interpretation of a dream about walking at night. Interpretation of darkness in a dream. So this is what we will show you in this article from the encyclopedia. Seeing dark places in the streets and rooms is one of the things that causes fear and panic among some people. In fact, it is a type of “phobia” that suggests to some that something scary and unpleasant is happening to them, so seeing it in the dream world is not very promising for the dreamer, as it is believed to be an unpleasant vision. It portends the appearance of a dangerous substance. Although this vision is ambiguous, it is curious to know its interpretations in reality. Sometimes, undesirable symbols can bring favorable interpretations to the dreamer and vice versa. What did the dream interpreters say about the interpretation of this dream, you can see in the following lines. Seeing walking in an unknown and dark place, this vision indicates failure to achieve the desired success of the goal that the dreamer was seeking in reality. But if the dreamer sees that he is walking at night He feels sad and anxious, as this vision shows the problems and worries that he suffers from in reality. But if...

title: Interpretation of seeing the Husseini Council in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: In this article from gptafser.com/ we show you everything related to the Al-Husseini Council in a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq, and here are all the details of the vision. Interpretation of seeing the Al-Husseini Council in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq in an unmarried girl’s dream. When an unmarried girl sees a funeral in a dream, it is a vision that depends on The dreamer’s condition is what he sees. That is, if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is going to a funeral. It will provide a lot of livelihood and supplies and contains many opportunities that will make your life better. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees that she sees her consolation in the dream. She will have a good husband who will enjoy... With support and security. As for seeing an unmarried girl in a dream, it comforts her friend. The vision showed the mutual friendliness between the two sides, through which benefits arise. Or that her friend will marry a good man and that she is coming to help her celebrate her wedding. Crying profusely while attending someone’s funeral in a dream One person indicates the joy that will happen to her. See also: Interpretation of Al-Husseini Dreams Soothing advice for a married woman Interpretation of seeing the Al-Husseini Council in a dream Imam Al-Sadiq in a dream about a married woman Imam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing a married woman attending a funeral is one of the most common interpretations that includes more than one meaning: Why Seeing a woman attending her husband’s funeral in a dream announces a lot of good news that she will hear about her husband. She can be good at her husband’s work. But if a married woman sees in a dream that she is attending a funeral with a group of people she does not know, then she is surprised by that. The vision may mean receiving news from a distant person. Or that he was in a place far away from her, and he may come to her soon. In the event that a married woman sees that she is present at the funeral with her family and friends, and she was sad in a dream while attending the funeral in the dream. The vision indicated getting rid of A major obstacle was going to fall on him at some point. Seeing condolences can be interpreted in a dream for a married woman who is suffering from many marital problems between her and her husband while she is awake, and she saw this dream. The vision showed an improvement in all family affairs that have some problems. Especially since she will find a solution. For all the problems between her and her husband by the command of God Almighty. That is, the vision that we have already talked about. It indicates many things that make the life of the visionary good, and a sign of good omen by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing Al-Husseini Council in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq in a dream about a man and its meaning. As for seeing the consolation of a married man It is one of the indications that indicate the special status of visions. Seeing a married man watching someone’s funeral in a dream appears. However, God Almighty grants him good offspring, and that too if he expects a child. As for seeing a married man sitting comfortably in a dream, it is a sign. On changing circumstances and improving life to a better state, God willing. It may indicate obtaining a job, a promotion, or similar matters. In the event that the married man is going through difficult financial circumstances, and he sees that he is afraid of great comfort in a dream. He will work to improve the economic conditions that were an obstacle in His life. He loves

title: Dream interpretation of hair advice for single women by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about combing hair Many people always ask about the interpretation of a dream about combing hair in a dream. Advice and combing hair in a dream are visions that many people see in their dreams. It also indicates many different meanings and interpretations, but it differs according to the condition of the hair, whether the hair is curly, straight, long, etc., and it also differs according to the person who sees it, whether she is a married woman. , woman or man. Hair in a dream Seeing hair in a dream generally refers to fame, vanity and temptation, and the condition of the hair symbolizes situations in our real life and our thoughts. If the hair in the dream is tangled, this vision indicates that the person has lost certainty in his life and that this person's life is full of confusion and he cannot think properly. When a person sees that he has radically changed the shape of his hair in a dream, this means that there will be a change in his real life. We will learn about the interpretation of the dream of combing hair in a dream through a different website. Interpretation of a dream of styling hair for a single woman Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream of combing hair Interpretation of hair consultation for single women Where Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a hairdressing salon in an unmarried woman's dream has many interpretations, including: When a person dreams that he is combing and fixing his hair and that his hair is long, this dream indicates that this person will get good and abundant money. If a person sees in a dream that he is combing his short hair, this is evidence that he will gain a lot of knowledge and remain in high positions. When a person sees that he is combing his hair with a wooden comb, this dream is evidence that this person is very afraid of Envy. If someone dreams that he is giving his wife a wooden comb, this is a sign that this woman will soon become pregnant. And when a person sees that he has received an empty comb, this is evidence that this person has obtained a lot of money. If a person sees that he is combing his hair but it is difficult to comb his hair because it is complicated, this indicates that this person suffers from worries and problems in his life. When a person sees that he is combing his hair with ease and ease, this is evidence that this person achieves all his goals and aspirations that he seeks in life. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of a dream about combing hair in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen interprets the vision of combing hair in a dream as a sign of happiness, joy and great happiness in the dreamer's life. It can also indicate getting rid of worries and sorrows in that person's life. When a person dreams that he is combing his hair with a golden comb, this dream indicates that he will soon hear happy news. It also indicates that the dreamer will have a good opportunity in his life and he must take advantage of this opportunity. When a person sees in a dream that he is combing his hair and his hair is short, this indicates that the dreamer will gain a lot of knowledge And an excellent position soon. Whoever sees that he is combing his hair and his hair is tangled, this vision is not good. It is also evidence that he is facing many worries and problems in life.

title: Interpretation of seeing your enemy in a dream, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing your enemy in a dream. Seeing your enemy in a dream has some interpretations that differ depending on the person’s vision. Then we explained some matters related to this vision and its interpretations... So follow us. Seeing your enemy in a dream Seeing your enemy in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates that the dreamer has more than one event in his life, and this It is due to what was stated in the dream. If the dreamer sees in the dream that he is fighting with one of his enemies, it is interpreted that things have worsened in the past period and that the problems have worsened. If a person sees in his dream that he is striking one of his enemies and defeating him, this is good news and one of the useful signs that the dreamer will be liberated. Of the machinations that were plotted against him. If a person sees in a dream that one of his enemies has defeated him in a prominent position among them, this is an indication that the dreamer has emerged from the state of sadness that prevailed in his life in the past period. If the dreamer finds in a dream an enemy to whom he gives advice, this indicates However, this person is not suitable for him, rather he is a deceiver and wants to betray him. Seeing your enemy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin Seeing your enemy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin means that the dreamer has fallen into a major financial crisis, which makes his affairs completely unstable. If the dreamer finds one of his enemies talking to him In a dream, this indicates the problems that befell the dreamer in the past period, which made him feel uncomfortable in his life. If one sees in a dream that he is speaking loudly to one of his enemies and threatening him, this symbolizes that the dreamer can overcome the crisis that occurred with his enemy. And he will get what he wants in the coming period. In his life. It is good omens that the dreamer can eliminate his opponent in the dream, so it is interpreted that there is more than one good thing happening in the dreamer’s life now and that he is able to overcome this difficult stage. If one sees in a dream that he entered the house of one of his enemies, This indicates that the dreamer has fallen into a trap set for him, and God knows best. When a person in a dream gets rid of an opponent without harming him, this is a sign that God is helping the dreamer and that he will obtain many good things that God has decreed for him. Seeing your enemy in a single woman’s dream is Seeing your enemy in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that the dreamer is trying to reach the things she desires, but the obstacles in her life are stronger than her. If the girl finds one of her enemies in the dream, this indicates her feeling of loneliness and her inability to overcome this difficult period. Vision The enemy in a dream does not bode well, especially if he begins to argue with the dreamer. It is a sign of increasing crises in the dreamer’s life. If an unmarried woman dreams of running away from her enemy, this is a sign that the dreamer is destined to reach what he faces, but after overcoming the difficulties. which he faced in the recent period. If the girl finds in the dream that she is trying to escape by giving advice to the opponent, this indicates that she has been deceived in reality by a person with whom she has enmity. The enemy’s smile in the girl’s dream is a sign that the dreamer is facing real danger from this person and therefore does not Feels comfortable, but anxiety controls her life. Seeing your enemy in a dream is...

title: I dreamed that I was arguing with my girlfriend

preview.html: I dreamed that I quarreled with my girlfriend over a website, seeing the website roy2a.com. Friendship is one of the most beautiful and sincere social relationships, and the presence of a friend in a person’s life makes him feel very supported and accepted, and as we mention, the relationship of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. He has peace and an example with our master Abu Bakr and how their relationship was an example of a good relationship (he said to his friend, “Do not be jealous, may God be with us”) and in light of this we will try. Today, seeing a fight with a friend in a dream is the most important interpretations given by the great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. I dreamed that I was arguing with my friend. Seeing an old friend in a dream is an indication of his thinking about the past and that he wants to return to the details of his events within a year. As for seeing Fighting and quarreling with a friend in a dream? It is an indication of an agreement between them or transactions and advantages that will be created between them recently. Seeing a friend wearing elegant clothes in a dream indicates that you are hearing good news. As for seeing a friend in an impolite manner in a dream, this is a sign that you are hearing bad news. Seeing quarrels and fertility with friends in a dream. In general, a good vision indicates compatibility with each other, support and mutual assistance. As most of the time, seeing rivalry in friendship during sleep is supposed to be a negative sign of a good relationship. I dreamed that I was arguing with my girlfriend Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing disputes and violence in a dream with a close person, this could be a sign of negative feelings that the viewer transmits to the other party. Seeing a fight with one of the parents in a dream indicates the dreamer’s lack of attention and care and the seriousness of his emotional need. Hitting a family member in a dream. Benefits obtained by its founder or success in the commodity. A dispute in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is a sign of reconciliation. I dreamed that I quarreled with my only friend. Seeing a beautiful girl in one dream indicates that good news will reach her in the near future or that she will achieve something that she has been waiting for for a long time. Seeing a quarrel indicates that With a friend in one's dream is a sign of love and tenderness between them in reality. Seeing a friend in a dream indicates a bad appearance. He will hear sad news. I dreamed that I quarreled with my married friend. Seeing a friend in a married woman's dream can be a reflection of herself, her character and her appearance in reality. Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream indicates A married woman, or if her name bodes well, such as Sarah or Iman, then these are all hopeful interpretations of happy news and success in her life. If you see an old friend in a dream, it means that she is married, and that there is goodness and happiness to come in Assam. I dreamed that I had a quarrel with my pregnant friend, seeing in a dream A pregnant woman is arguing with one of her friends. This indicates the goodness that exists between them and the friendly and supportive relationship between them and the one who saw her in the dream. Seeing a quarrel with a friend in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that in reality there were disagreements or rivalries between them, as the vision suggests an almost complete reconciliation.

title: Interpretation of a dream about leaving or escaping from prison in a dream

preview.html: Seeing an escape from prison in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, someone escaping from prison for a prisoner. He sees in a dream that he is escaping and getting out of prison, as there are some dreams that make a person panic and worry, so when he wakes up from his sleep Looking for the correct and accurate interpretation of this dream. Today, through our distinguished website, we present to you a group of Arab scholars and leading interpreters. Interpretation of leaving or escaping from prison in a dream: If one sees in a dream that he will leave prison after his acquittal is judged, this is a good expression and indicates the release of pending or accumulated problems. He is patient and then fulfills his desires. If he then sees that dogs are chasing him, this is his interpretation of the problems caused by haters and enemies. Escaping from prison indicates liberation from the desires of the soul and its liberation from the control of desires and the control or hardening of desires. The vision and interpretation differ from one person to another depending on the place, time, and person who sees it, so you should To say the vision correctly until you reach its accurate interpretation. Interpretation of getting out of prison in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she has entered prison, this is evidence that she has married a person of high status and power, and this pleasant skin means marrying him and living with him happily. And joy. And that soon his deception will be revealed, and if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that there is someone crying and screaming in prison, then this is evidence of problems and difficulties in this girl’s life and they will end soon, God willing. Interpretation of leaving prison in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is imprisoned, this is evidence of The disease that this woman suffers from and that she will soon recover from, God willing... A married woman dreamed that her husband was imprisoned. This is evidence of the imbalance in her relationship with her husband, and that they are facing many problems, but they will end soon, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of getting out of prison in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that she is imprisoned, this is evidence of the distress and pain she is suffering from during this period. A voice you did not recognize, this is evidence of the stress of childbirth, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of leaving prison in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is imprisoned, this is evidence of the difficulty of life that this woman is living in this period. And if a divorced woman sees in a dream that she has been released from prison after serving her sentence. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that someone she knows is imprisoned, this is evidence of her victory over her enemies, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of getting out of prison in a dream for an old woman. If an old woman sees in a dream that she is imprisoned, this is evidence. She is exhausted and is suffering from an illness from which she will recover soon, God willing. Interpretation of getting out of prison in a dream for a man: If a man sees in a dream that he is imprisoned because of injustice, this is evidence of patience with the disasters or hardships that this dreamer is going through. And if a person sees in a dream that he has been released From imprisonment after a while, this is evidence of the debts he owes. But if he sees

title: Interpretation of shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you what is the interpretation of shoes in a dream, according to what was explained by the interpretive scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin in his book Interpretation of Dreams. He buys new shoes and sometimes he sees that his shoes are cut off and he wants to know the meaning of this dream. A pregnant woman in detail, so follow us. Interpretation of shoes in a dreamInterpretation of shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that shoes in a man’s dream of shoes symbolizes nourishment, while in a woman’s dream it indicates her marriage. Seeing new shoes in a dream indicates the new job that he will get The dreamer in the coming period. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is wearing old shoes, this indicates a lot of money that he will receive soon. Seeing the shoes falling in a dream indicates the accumulation of debts on the dreamer, but God will help him pay them. Seeing lost shoes in a dream indicates The ability of the dreamer to deal with all the problems and difficulties in his life. If the sleeper sees in his dream an upside-down shoe, this is a sign of great wealth and abundance. Seeing a child’s shoes in a dream means that the dreamer suffers from a lack of attention and needs to feel love and affection. If the sleeper sees in his dream That he wears only one shoe, this indicates the presence of disagreements with his life partner. If the dreamer dreams that the shoes are burning, this is a sign of traveling abroad in the coming period. Shoes in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream black shoes and she has high heels, then this A sign of the approaching date of her engagement. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing shoes made of gold, this is a sign of marriage in the near future. Seeing white shoes in a single person’s dream also indicates marriage. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that there are some letters On her shoes, this is a sign that she is unable to make a decision about choosing who she wants to get involved with. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing new shoes, this is a sign of engagement. Brown shoes in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing brown shoes in The dream of an unmarried girl symbolizes her work and work. If an unmarried girl sees brown shoes in her dream, this is a sign that she will suffer from some problems, but God will help her get rid of them. Interpretation of shoes in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing new shoes This is a sign that a strange man has entered her life. Seeing black shoes in a married woman’s dream means that she will get a new job. If a married woman sees in her dream that her shoes are missing, this indicates the presence of disagreements and problems between her and her husband. Seeing old shoes in a married woman’s dream It indicates the return of someone she knows. If a married woman dreams that her husband is giving shoes to someone else, this is a sign that she will separate from her husband or that she will marry again. Shoes in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is buying new shoes, this is a sign of good news that she will hear soon. Seeing her wearing shoes is great

Interpretation of dreams about seeing my ex-wife angry in a dream. If a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband is upset in a dream, this may be a sign of happiness, as she can express her ex-husband’s happiness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of quarreling with my ex-wife in a dream The interpretation of a dream of quarreling with my ex-wife in a dream can be a sign that his ex-wife is demanding her dues, and God knows best. A quarrel with your ex-husband may also indicate self-control over her, and God knows best. When you see a quarrel with your ex-wife, it may lead to denying her virtue, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a quarrel with his ex-wife in a dream, this may be a sign of bad things he does to her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing.
